name: Alec Bradley - Vice Press - Toro
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley cigars are one of the leading premium cigar brands in the world. In operation since 1996, Alec Bradley has created dozens of fine blends such as Prensado, Black Market, the American Classic and American Sun Grown. Vice Press cigars are the ideal mixture of spice, cocoa, and peppercorn and rated 92 for a reason! These medium-bodied smokes are made with the best Nicaraguan, Mexican and Honduran fillers and tobaccos. Each cigar is tightly box-pressed and wrapped in a dark Nicaraguan wrapper.
